metadata.title: CVE-2022-28085 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in htmldoc commit 31f7804. A heap buffer overflow in thefunction pdf_write_names in ps-pdf.cxx may lead to arbitrary code executionand Denial of Service (DoS).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-28085` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

htmldoc - 1.9.2-1ubuntu0.2+esm2
htmldoc-common - 1.9.2-1ubuntu0.2+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.2-1ubuntu0.2+esm2').
